statements: SELECT * FROM conservation_effectiveness_measure ORDER BY measure_id DESC;
SELECT measure_name, after_data FROM conservation_effectiveness_measure WHERE before_data > 100;
SELECT after_data, before_data, measure_name FROM conservation_effectiveness_measure WHERE measure_id = 3;
SELECT measure_name FROM conservation_effectiveness_measure ORDER BY measure_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM conservation_effectiveness_measure WHERE after_data < 50;
SELECT measure_name, after_data, before_data FROM conservation_effectiveness_measure;
SELECT * FROM conservation_effectiveness_measure WHERE before_data > 100 AND after_data < 50;
SELECT measure_name, SUM(after_data - before_data) AS data_change FROM conservation_effectiveness_measure GROUP BY measure_name;
SELECT MAX(before_data) AS max_before_data, MIN(after_data) AS min_after_data FROM conservation_effectiveness_measure;
SELECT * FROM conservation_effectiveness_measure ORDER BY after_data DESC, measure_name;
SELECT * FROM ConservationBefore;
SELECT id, measure_name FROM ConservationBefore WHERE effectiveness_rating > 3;
SELECT measure_name, id, effectiveness_rating FROM ConservationAfter WHERE measure_name LIKE 'Habitat%';
SELECT * FROM ConservationBefore WHERE id = 10;
SELECT id, measure_name, effectiveness_rating FROM ConservationAfter ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConservationBefore WHERE effectiveness_rating > 3 ORDER BY measure_name DESC;
SELECT measure_name, MAX(effectiveness_rating) FROM ConservationBefore GROUP BY measure_name;
SELECT id, measure_name, effectiveness_rating FROM ConservationBefore JOIN ConservationAfter ON ConservationBefore.id = ConservationAfter.id;
SELECT * FROM ConservationAfter WHERE measure_name LIKE 'Improvement%' AND effectiveness_rating >= 4;
SELECT AVG(effectiveness_rating) AS avg_rating FROM ConservationBefore;
SELECT * FROM ConservationMeasuresBefore;
SELECT measure_name, effectiveness_score FROM ConservationMeasuresBefore;
SELECT id, measure_name, post_effects_score FROM ConservationMeasuresAfter;
SELECT id, measure_name, before_effectiveness_score, after_effectiveness_score FROM ConservationMeasureComparison;
SELECT * FROM ConservationMeasureComparison WHERE before_effectiveness_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM ConservationMeasuresBefore;
SELECT id, measure_name FROM ConservationMeasuresAfter WHERE post_effects_score > 0.5;
SELECT measure_name, before_effectiveness_score FROM ConservationMeasureComparison ORDER BY before_effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConservationMeasuresBefore WHERE effectiveness_score < 0.3;
SELECT measure_name, after_effectiveness_score FROM ConservationMeasureComparison WHERE after_effectiveness_score > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM conservation_measure_before;
SELECT id, measure_name, effectiveness_score FROM conservation_measure_after WHERE effectiveness_score > 80;
SELECT measure_name FROM conservation_measure_impact WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM conservation_measure_comparison ORDER BY before_effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT measure_name, after_effectiveness_score FROM conservation_measure_comparison WHERE before_effectiveness_score < 50;
SELECT * FROM conservation_measure_before;
SELECT id, measure_name FROM conservation_measure_after WHERE effectiveness_score > 50;
SELECT id, measure_name, impact_description FROM conservation_measure_impact WHERE id = 1;

SELECT cmc.id, cmc.measure_id, cmb.measure_name as before_measure, cma.measure_name as after_measure FROM conservation_measure_comparison cmc JOIN conservation_measure_before cmb ON cmc.before_effectiveness_score = cmb.effectiveness_score JOIN conservation_measure_after cma ON cmc.after_effectiveness_score = cma.effectiveness_score;
SELECT measure_name, impact_description FROM conservation_measure_impact ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM ConservationMeasuresBefore ORDER BY implementation_date DESC, measure_id ASC
SELECT measure_name, effectiveness_score FROM ConservationMeasuresAfter WHERE measure_id = 1
SELECT * FROM ConservationDataBefore WHERE observation_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT measure_name, effectiveness_score, implementation_date FROM ConservationMeasuresBefore
SELECT result_id, measure_id, before_effectiveness_score, after_effectiveness_score FROM ConservationResults
SELECT measure_name, implementation_date FROM ConservationMeasuresBefore WHERE effectiveness_score > 70;
SELECT measure_name, observation_date, conservation_data FROM ConservationDataBefore ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ConservationMeasuresAfter WHERE measure_id IN (SELECT measure_id FROM ConservationResults WHERE before_effectiveness_score < after_effectiveness_score);
SELECT measure_name, implementation_date FROM ConservationMeasuresBefore WHERE measure_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(effectiveness_score) AS avg_score FROM ConservationMeasuresBefore
